title: Masterpieces of Japanese Woodblock Prints: Actors in Kabuki Performance
description: This exhibition of Japanese woodblock prints of the 17th, 18th, and 19th centuries illustrated the lively interplay between the fine and performing arts in the Edo Period. The Ukiyo-e prints on display were all drawn from the museum’s collection, one of the foremost assemblages of such works in the world.

input: Masterpieces of Japanese Woodblock Prints: Actors in Kabuki Performance
